metadata.subject: France. Sovereign (1774-1792 : Louis XVI)
metadata.title: Recueil d'opinions sur le jugement de Louis XVI.
metadata.creator: France. Convention nationale.
France. Convention nationale
metadata.description: Without t.p. Title from signature mark

Contributors: François Aubry, Balla, J.A. Barrot, Alexandre Besson, Billard-Varenne, Boucher de Saint-Sauveur, Briez, Casenave, Chales, Jean-Pierre Chazal, Delbrel, Delecloy, Camille-Desmoulins, Claude Fauchet, Jacques Garnier, Vadier, Jacques-Antoine Rabaut, L.J. Savary, Louis Roux, François Robert, François Rivaud, Charles Perard, F.A. Mont-Gilbert, Louis-Sébastien Mercier, Robert-Thomas Lindet, J.Ph. Garran, Lahaye, "Motifs de J.M. Gelin et M.A. Baudot."
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on cover page. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
